title: Victoria Beckham pokes fun at her past Spice Girls make-up to promote her new beauty range
text:
She's been busy promoting her new beauty range called Victoria Beckham Beauty across the globe.

And Victoria Beckham decided to poke fun at her past Spice Girls make-up as she shared a fun throwback snap of herself in the girl band during the 90s to Instagram on Tuesday.

In the picture, the singer turned fashion designer, 45, looked almost unrecognisable as she wore a full face of heavy make-up including smokey eyeshadow.

Way back when: Victoria Beckham decided to poke fun at her past Spice Girls make-up as she shared a fun throwback snap of herself in the girl band during the 90s to Instagram on Tuesday

Wearing her signature brunette bob and a skimpy beige vest top, Victoria posed to the camera while applying a slick of lip liner.

Writing a witty caption, the star penned alongside the snap: 'Posh likes to use @victoriabeckhambeauty Lip Definer No. 2 + 3. What’s #yourperfectnude? X Kisses VB.'

The designer rose to fame as Posh Spice in the hit 90s girl band Spice Girls with Mel B, Emma Bunton, Mel C and Geri Horner recently reuniting for a summer tour without Victoria.

Victoria, who is currently promoting her new beauty range in New York, has been showing of her fun side recently and she also shared a hilarious video to Instagram on Tuesday showing off her dance moves.

Unrecognisable: In the picture, the singer turned fashion designer, 45, looked almost unrecognisable as she wore a full face of heavy make-up including smokey eyeshadow (pictured in throwback snap, left, and in 2018, right)

Fun: Writing a witty caption, the star penned alongside the snap: 'Posh likes to use @victoriabeckhambeauty Lip Definer No. 2 + 3. What’s #yourperfectnude? X Kisses VB.'

Stardom: Victoria rose to fame as Posh Spice in the hit 90s girl band Spice Girls (pictured together at the height of their fame in the 90s)

The designer danced with some of the tourists to the Bee Gees hit Staying Alive with the bright lights of New York on full display behind her.

In the fun video, Victoria embraced the disco era with black flares as she strutted down the street still packed with tourists.

The former Spice Girl was joined by a male pal along with groups of tourists, and even busted some moves with a life-size version of the Sesame Street character Elmo.

Luckily plenty of the city's tourists were quick to join in on the fun, as they danced along to the iconic Saturday Night Fever hit.

Victoria captioned the playful video: 'Back in New York!! @victoriabeckhambeauty lip launch today!! xxxx Kisses.'

Energetic: Victoria, who is currently promoting her new beauty range in New York, has been showing of her fun side recently and she also shared a hilarious video to Instagram on Tuesday showing off her dance moves

Fun: The designer danced with some of the tourists to the Bee Gees hit Staying Alive with the bright lights of the city on full display behind her

Chic: As ever Victoria put on a stylish display in black flares and a white blouse as she danced along the streets of New York

The outing came after Victoria revealed the boozy secret to her healthy lifestyle during a playful appearance on This Morning last week.

The Spice Girl discussed her penchant for tequila and red wine alongside a balanced lifestyle on the show, saying: 'I try to be really really healthy, I expect a lot of myself and my body.

'I have four kids and work a lot, I try to be healthy, fresh fish, fresh vegetables, fruit and I drink a lot of water.

'I am not saying I’m not fun, I am known to drink a few tequilas and a few red wines, it’s that balance. Working out, but having fun is also super important.'
